metadata.longDescription: Azure Service Bus is a generic, cloud-based messaging system for connecting just about anything—applications, services, and devices—wherever they are. Connect apps running on Azure, on-premises systems, or both. You can even use Service Bus to connect household appliances, sensors, and other devices like tablets or phones to a central application or to each other.

plans.description: Your cost depends on your operations. See details: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/service-bus/
